events.summary: Juan presents Princess Catalina to the court. Carries her to the throne room. Announces Isabel's serious illness, asks for prayers.

exchanges.text: I show you my beautiful daughter, Princess Catalina.
Court receives Catalina warmly. Prayers for Isabel.

events.summary: Budget planning for 1432 with Álvaro and the Cardinal. 1431 expenses nearly on budget (142K vs 143K florins). Strategy: rebel campaign March-April, then Granada May-November. Don't siege Granada directly — take surrounding forts, starve them. Budget: 170-200K florins.

exchanges.text: Review last year. Plan the 1432 campaign.
1431 on budget. 1432: rebels first, then Granada starvation strategy.

events.summary: Military planning for rebel campaign. Bombards ordered to Niebla. Sotomayor handled without artillery. Infante Juan commands Seville army (7,000). Land grant system for western Granada nobles. Military Academy planning solidified.

exchanges.text: Bombards to Niebla. Sotomayor without artillery.
Orders issued. Land grants and academy planned.
